snippet: Even at 40, the Mets off-season acquisition Bartolo Colon continues to rely on his fastball more than any starter in baseball.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that New York Mets off-season acquisition Bartolo Colon continues to rely on his fastball more than any starter in baseball, even at age 40; says he is his own physical marvel, with exceptional athleticism that helps him succeed despite carrying 265 pounds on a 5-foot-11 frame.
lead_paragraph: Even at 40, the Mets off-season acquisition Bartolo Colon continues to rely on his fastball more than any starter in baseball.

headline.seo: Mets’ Bartolo Colon Depends Heavily On One Pitch
headline.main: A Veteran Sticks With the Fastball
headline.print_headline: A Veteran Sticks With the Fastball
